detail.title: Staging environment
detail.name: Name
detail.subfolderHelptext: If you are running Shopware in a sub directory you need to add it here, so that the domains for the sales channeles are set correct!
detail.excludedFoldersHelpText: Please add comma separated, e.g. media, documents/files, my/private/folder
detail.clearDatabaseInfoText: The configured database will be cleared. All data will be deleted irreversible.
detail.clearDatabaseConfirmLabel: Yes, please clear the database irreversible.
detail.clearFilesInfoText: The files of the configured staging environment will be deleted. This process is not reversible.
detail.clearFilesConfirmLabel: Yes, please delete the files irreversible.

create.title: New staging environment
create.name: Name
create.error: Error occured. Environment was not created!

stepsContent.preparation: In the preparation step the system proves if everything is correct to create a new staging environment.
stepsContent.syncFiles: In this step all files will be copied in the appropriate sub folder, so that Shopware 6 has everything it needs to run smoothly.
stepsContent.cloneDatabase: The database is a crucial part of a running system. All tables will be cloned and filled with the content of the main system.
stepsContent.updateSettings: At the end some settings needs to be updated on the lately created staging database.
stepsContent.finished: Congratulations! Your staging environemnt is up and running! Clicking on 'Start' again resets the process!
